short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arducam Camera Preview For Makecode Block

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin adds a preview image through which you can preview the pictures taken from the microbit.
Instructions for use:
1. After the plug-in is turned on, a photo button will appear in the menu of the makecode official website
2. Click the button to pop up the preview image
3. You can click the download button on the preview to save the picture, or click the pull-up to hide the preview
FAQ:
1. The camera button does not appear?
Confirm whether you have enabled the plugin. Or refresh the page and try again
2. The preview image is damaged?
Try to take pictures a few times, maybe the damage comes from the picture
others:
If you have any questions, please send an email to
info@arducam.com
